{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Arcadyan |model=EasyBox 904 xDSL |revision=R01 (Vodafone) |asin=B00A6QL4CQ;DE;,B00UO2B56W;DE; |est_release_date=03/13/2015 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=VGV952C |manuf_rev=JW33-E-IR |availability=now |type=wireless router, dsl modem, CPE, |fcc_id= |pcb_id=141952C20002J |pwr_v=15 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Lantiq |cpu1_model=PSB 80910;XWAY VRX268, PSB 80910 EL V1.2; |cpu1_cspeed=500 |cpu2_brand=Ralink |cpu2_model=RT3883F |cpu2_cspeed=500 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F4G08U0D |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM68C16CWQD-25H |ram2=16 |ram2_brand=Winbond |ram2_model=W9812G6JH-6 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3883F |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi2_chip1_model=RT5392L |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8367RB |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=AFE/LD Companion Chip for VRX200;Lantiq;PSB 80190;PSB 80190 V, V1.1, XWAY VRX208;1; ,,, Dual Channel Telephone Line Interface (FXS);Lantiq;PEF 42068;PEF 42068 V, V1.2, XWAY SLIC120;1; |flags=ADSL2+, ISDN, FXS, LCD |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.32; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=88:03:55 |oui_eth=88:03:55 }} {{TagLine|Vodafone Easybox 904 xDSL Modem Router}} :[[Category:Vodafone|Vodafone]] EasyBox 904 xDSL - [[Arcadyan]] VGV952CJW33-E-IR
===Wikis=== *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/inbox/arcadyanastoria/arcadyan_astoria_easybox_904xdsl_r01 ''Arcadyan/Astoria Easybox 904 xDSL'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/arcadyan/easybox_904_lte. ''Astoria Networks Easybox 904 LTE'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=44676 ''Vodafone Easybox 904'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] *[https://www.randomprojects.org/wiki/Vodafone_EasyBox_904_xDSL ''Vodafone EasyBox 904 xDSL''] (Spec. and PCB photos)
=== Hardware === *CPU: [[Lantiq]] PSB 80920 EL V1.2 (XWAY VRX288) (@500MHz MIPS 34Kc) *Flash: [http://www.samsung.com/us/business/oem-solutions/onlinetool/slc_flash.html Samsung K9F4G08U0D] (512MB SLC x8 3.3V NAND flash) :markings "Samsung 404 K9F4G08U0D SCB0 CXL334GDN" ([http://www.datasheet4u.com/datasheet/K/9/F/K9F4G08U0D_Samsung.pdf.html DS]) *RAM: [http://www.etron.com/en/products/specialtydram_detial.php?Product_ID=33 EtronTech EM68C16CWQD-25H] (128MB DDR2 SDRAM, 400MHz'') :markings "EtronTech EM68C16CWQD-25H R21BD01108300E.12" ([http://www.etron.com/manager/uploads/EM68C16CWQE_rev1.4.pdf DS]) *RAM: [http://www.winbond.com/hq/enu/ProductAndSales/ProductLines/SpecialtyDRAM/SDRAM/W9812G6JH.htm Winbond W9812G6JH-6] (16MB SDRAM, 166MHz/CL3) :markings "Winbond W9812G6JH-6 1311W 624607500ZX" ([http://www.winbond.com/NR/rdonlyres/E91DDBB1-887F-41A5-A3D7-801285D7A500/0/W9812G6JH.pdf DS]) *WLAN 5GHz: [[Ralink]] RT3883F (''802.11abgn 2.4/5GHz 3T3R WiSoC'') ([https://wikidevi.com/files/Ralink/RT3883%20product%20brief.pdf PB]) *WLAN 2.4GHz: [[Ralink]] RT5392L/SiGe 5005L, markings "SiGe 5005L 301BF" *Switch: [[Realtek]] [http://www.realtek.com/products/productsView.aspx?Langid=1&PNid=18&PFid=15&Level=5&Conn=4&ProdID=300 RTL8367RB] (''Layer2 managed 5+2-port 10/100/1000M'') :markings "RTL8367RB E1C43E1 GE02 TAIWAN" *xDSL AFE/LD: [[Lantiq]] [http://www.lantiq.com/digital-home/dsl-gateways/vdsl2-wifi-router/entry-level-vdsl2-router/ PSB 80190 V V1.1] (XWAY VRX208) (''ADSL2+'') ([http://www.lantiq.com/uploads/media//Lantiq_XWAY-VRX268_Product-Brief_04.pdf PB]) *FXS: [[Lantiq]] [http://www.lantiq.com/digital-home/dsl-gateways/vdsl2-wifi-voip-gateway/entry-level-vdsl2-voip-gateway/ PEF 42068 V V1.2] (XWAY SLIC120) (''Dual channel FXS)'') ([http://www.lantiq.com/uploads/media//Lantiq_XWAY-SLIC100_Product-Brief_09.pdf PB]) *ISDN: [[Lantiq]] [http://www.lantiq.com/digital-home/all-digital-home-products/ PEF 82902 F V1.1] (''TSMINTI-4B3T ISDN NT (intell.)'') ([http://media.digikey.com/pdf/Data%20Sheets/Infineon%20PDFs/PEF%2082902.pdf DS]) *Voice/DAA: [http://www.silabs.com/products/voice/daa/Pages/default.aspx SiLabs Si3050-FT] (''Voice direct access arrangement (DAA)'') :markings "Si3050-FT 1404EM e3 F1B4" ([http://www.silabs.com/Support%20Documents/TechnicalDocs/Si3050-11-18-19.pdf DS], [http://www.silabs.com/Support%20Documents/TechnicalDocs/si3050evb.pdf UG]) *DAA: [http://www.silabs.com/products/voice/daa/Pages/default.aspx SiLabs Si3011-FS] (''TBR-21 line-side device'') :markings "Si3011-FS e3 1350FFL0B1" ([http://www.silabs.com/Support%20Documents/TechnicalDocs/Si3050-11-18-19.pdf DS]) *PMU: [http://www.ixysic.com/Products/LLSupervICs.htm IXYS CPC5712] (''Voltage monitor with detectors'') :markings "CPC5712U M116 1213" ([http://www.ixysic.com/home/pdfs.nsf/www/CPC5712.pdf/$file/CPC5712.pdf DS]) *LCD: [http://www.ilitek.com/products-e.asp ILITEK ILI9341] (''TFT LCD, 320x240 RGB, 262K colors'') ([http://www.displayfuture.com/Display/datasheet/controller/ILI9341.pdf DS]) *[[NXP]]: NXP 8029HL07, markings "NXP 8029HL07 02 13 TSD 14022"
==Images== *[https://www.randomprojects.org/wiki/Vodafone_EasyBox_904_xDSL#PCB_photos PCB photos] <gallery> File:Eb904xdsl casing front.jpg|casing front </gallery>
